00021         typedef enum {
00022                 TERMTYPE_INVALID = 0
00023                 ,TERMTYPE_UNSUPPORTED //1
00024                 ,TERMTYPE_END         //2
00025                 ,TERMTYPE_START_LIST  //3
00026                 ,TERMTYPE_END_LIST    //4
00027                 ,TERMTYPE_START_TUPLE //5
00028                 ,TERMTYPE_ATOM        //6
00029                 ,TERMTYPE_STRING      //7
00030                 ,TERMTYPE_DOUBLE      //8
00031                 ,TERMTYPE_LONG        //9
00032                 ,TERMTYPE_ULONG       //10
00033                 ,TERMTYPE_LONGLONG    //11
00034                 ,TERMTYPE_ULONGLONG   //12
00035                 ,TERMTYPE_BINARY      //13
00036                 //,TERMTYPE_CHAR        // NOT DEFINED in ei.h
00037                 //,TERMTYPE_BOOLEAN     // NOT DEFINED in ei.h
00038                 ,TERMTYPE_NIL         //14
00039         } TermType;
00040 
00041 
00042         typedef struct _TermStruct {
00043                 TermType type;
00044                 long size; // only applicable to string
00045                 union {
00046                         unsigned long uinteger;
00047                         long integer;
00048                         long long linteger;
00049                         unsigned long long luinteger;
00050                         double afloat;
00051                         void *string;
00052                 } Value;
00053         } TermStruct;

00057         /**
00058          * Term Handler
00059          *
00060          * This class serves as the main API for clients.
00061          */
00062         class TermHandler: public epapiBase {
00063 
00064         public:
00065                 static const char *term_strings[];
00066 
00067         protected:
00068 
00069                 Pkt *p;
00070                 int index; // for the rx side
00071

00073                 /**
00074                  * Constructor
00075                  */
00076                 TermHandler(void);
00077 
00078                 /**
00079                  * Destructor
00080                  */
00081                 ~TermHandler();
00082 
00083                 /**
00084                  * Cleans a TermStruct
00085                  * i.e. frees the 'string' component
00086                  *
00087                  * @param ts TermStruct
00088                  */
00089                 void clean(TermStruct *ts);
00090 
00091                 /**
00092                  * Returns a human readable string
00093                  * corresponding to a specific term type
00094                  *
00095                  * @param type TermType
00096                  * @return const char *
00097                  */
00098                 const char *termtype_tostring(TermType type);
00099 
00100                 /**
00101                  * Initialize
00102                  *
00103                  * @param p Pkt pointer
00104                  */
00105                 void init(Pkt *p);
00106 
00107                 /**
00108                  * Appends an element to the packet
00109                  *
00110                  * @param type TermType
00111                  *
00112                  * @return 0 SUCCESS
00113                  * @return 1 FAILURE
00114                  */
00115                 int append(TermType type, ...);
00116 
00117                 /**
00118                  * Appends an element from a TermStruct
00119                  *
00120                  * @param ts TermStruct
00121                  * @return 0 SUCCESS
00122                  * @return 1 FAILURE
00123                  */
00124                 int append(TermStruct *ts);
00125 
00126                 /**
00127                  * Iteration interface - iterates over a packet
00128                  * and extracts all elements of the container term()
00129                  *
00130                  * @param ptr Pointer to TermStruct for receiving the term
00131                  *
00132                  * @return 0 SUCCESS
00133                  * @return 1 FAILURE
00134                  */
00135                 int iter(TermStruct *ptr);
